Name: Butterfly Moment
About the game: Tired of lead, rubber, pointy objects and a constant fear of impending doom? Then you should try Butterfly Moment, where all you have to do, is catch pretty little butterflies while admiring great views on a lush island. - Catch butterflies from stationary positions with your magic net. - Unlock new zones by catching more butterflies. - Travel (Teleport) between zones at any time. - Enjoy a unique and beautiful view from each zone. - Set your own pace. Relax, unwind and let your rhythm guide you. Visit Butterfly Island.
